alert.note: Alert for McMullen (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 07 at 9:26AM CDT until September 09 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Nueces River Near Tilden affecting McMullen County. For the Nueces River...including Tilden...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Nueces River Near Tilden. * WHEN...Until late Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding occurs, and causes sloughs and peripheral channels near the main stream to cut off areas of the flood plain, isolating livestock and damaging equipment in low areas. Oil field tank batteries and pump jacks flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 10.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 14.5 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Below are the latest river stages and stage forecasts: Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon Nueces River Tilden 14.0 10.1 Wed 8 am 13.5 13.9 11.6 9.2 7.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/crp.
